mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bumoim.groupphoto ( photo_content, photo_name, photo_id, photo_date ) VALUES ( #{content}, #{fileName}, #{writer}, CURDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT photo_number as num, photo_content as content, photo_id, photo_date as regDate, photo_name as fileName FROM bumoim.groupphoto ORDER BY photo_number DESC
SELECT photo_number as num, photo_content as content, photo_id as writer, photo_date as regDate, photo_name as fileName FROM bumoim.groupphoto WHERE photo_number = #{num}
